text: Itakyata tya doghimpaiki eka tyancyakade lajata lajata ali ani mhanali ki majhe pita tumhala bolavita aheta, yasathi ki tumhi je amacya janavaranna pani pajale ahe, tyaca mobadala dyava. Jevha (hajarata musa) tyancyajavala pohacale ani tyanna apali sarva katha aikavili, tevha te (pita) mhanale, ata bhaya balagu naka. Tumhi atyacari lokampasuna mukti prapta keli
